paragraph: Rene√© Garcia is a singer of Christian contemporary music. She was a backing singer with Amy Grant on the Straight Ahead, Unguarded and Heart in Motion tours and released two solo albums in the late 1980s. Currently, Garcia tours the US, singing in prisons with her husband. Her song, "Blessed Assurance", recorded as Renee Garcia-Bliss, is on the compilation album Best of Modern Worship (2008), released by Madacy. Most recently, she released an EP Life So Far.
